title: Research Specialist, Brand Experience
content:
Why We Have This Role
Our Strategy and Research (STaR) Software Services team is a newly established division dedicated to assisting our clients in setting up and utilizing a wide array of Qualtrics software products to tackle complex business challenges. A crucial part of our function lies in empowering customers to be proficient using the Qualtrics platform across a diverse range of research products (DesignXM, BX, UX). Our work is fundamental to the purchase and renewal f software, and seeing our customers become advocates of the software is a measure of our success.
We are currently in search of a naturally curious individual, passionate for understanding human behavior with 2+ years of relevant quantitative research experience within a market research or business analytics capacity. The Analyst will use their hands on market research skills to deliver research programs for customers that utilize Qualtrics software. We are looking for individuals passionate about designing and delivering programs with the highest level of client service.
How You’ll Find Success

Ability to support the execution of research projects flawlessly
Ability to write effective questionnaires, run basic statistical analyses and create insightful reports, under supervision of a Research Manager
Ability to work on multiple projects concurrently, at various stages of development, with a natural aptitude for organization, and creating deadline-driven deliverables are paramount for success
Manage the scope of requests from customers, to ensure expectations are aligned
High level of motivation and excellent communication skills required to manage a diverse slate of work, clients, and team personalities. 
Strong Google Suite or Excel/PowerPoint skills; Qualtrics platform experience preferred
Track record of delivering exceptional client experiences
Continuous improvement and growth mindset

How You’ll Grow

Consistently delivering flawless results and delighting our customers
Build your Market Research expertise across different methodologies (Brand and UX)
Developing expertise in the Qualtrics DesignXM, Brand and UX platforms
Owning strategic initiatives with cross-functional exposure/ sponsorship that have tremendous departmental and organizational impact
As a new team supporting new product offerings, we are presented with the unique opportunity to shape the future of our division, influencing products, processes, deliverables, and more. This role also promises the chance to develop and establish an unparalleled expertise within Qualtrics

Things You’ll Do

Handle logistics for quantitative research projects, including maintaining up to date documentation, organization and timelines of your programs. 
Own the scheduling and planning of relevant research engagements internally and with clients (with the ability and desire to learn how to manage both “up” and “down”)
Strong focus on quality control through testing survey links, checking data, and proofreading reports
Support clients on multi country programs, maintaining comprehensive notes and ensuring relevant actions are addressed in a timely manner 
Build relationships with vendors and partners, including managing quality control, approving coding lists, negotiating prices, and providing clear instructions
Effectively solve logistical issues and adjust on the fly.
Proactively identify product, program or process challenges and  suggest solutions on how to make projects run more smoothly
Write survey questionnaires that follow a structured flow and include appropriate question formats and well phrased questions that align to Qualtrics and industry best practices
Testing survey links (including testing for spelling, grammar, and logic skips)
Lead report creation including analysis, summary writing, charting and table creation using Google Suite, Excel or PowerPoint

What We’re Looking For On Your CV

Bachelor's or advanced degree in business, mathematics, or the sciences
A minimum of 2 years in applied custom research/operations role
Excellent PowerPoint, Google Slides and/or Keynote skills and ability to create slides/graphs/charts that convey key research findings in compelling ways
Qualtrics platform experience preferred
Comfortable in a fast-pace, unstructured, and highly competitive environment
Ability to communicate clearly and effectively through both written and spoken forms
Bilingual: English written and verbal proficiency

What You Should Know About This Team

You will work with a team of highly motivated, ambitious individuals who are always looking for new and more effective ways of delivering impact for the business.
Our client satisfaction rate is incredibly high and a point of pride for our teams. Identifying ways to continue to delight stakeholders is key.
The researchers on our team often incubate new products for the company. Creating space and encouraging this innovation is critical to our company’s growth and success.
The day-to-day in this role is dynamic and fast paced - the ability to prioritize and focus is critical to success.

What Differentiates Us From Other Companies 

Work-life integration and fun is deeply important to us! We have frequent office events, team outings, and happy hours
Annual Leave: 20 or 26 annual leave days per annum plus an additional day for each year of service (to a max of 5).
Private Medical Insurance- Luxmed health & dental cover for you and your dependants.
Commuter Assistance- Up to the value of 80 PLN net a month for public transport.
Savings Plan- Two company saving plans provided by Nationale Nederlanden: Employee Capital Plan (PPK) & Employee Saving Plan (PPO)
Wellness - Up to the value of 800PLN gross per quarter can be reimbursed for a variety of wellness activities via our dedicated platform Twic.
A choice of Multispot cards available.
Our employee assistance program with Unum provides counselling and wellbeing support to all employees
Experience bonus- 7000 PLN gross per annum. Qualtrics experience bonus is a program designed to provide experiences to our employees they might not otherwise have.
Group Life & Income Protection Insurance
Glasses/Contact lenses Reimbursement
Free breakfasts, lunches, snacks, and drinks for everyone in the office
Tax-deductible expenses (up to 75% depending on role)

To learn more about what we value read about it directly from our employees' Qualtrics Life stories

demographic_questions.description:
DEI (Diversity, Equity and Inclusion) is a cornerstone of our company culture. With strong views on diversity and inclusion, immigration, wage equality, and the universality of human rights—without regard to race, color, creed, gender, or sexual orientation— we will not be quiet but will amplify these views on behalf of our employees and organization. We are taking action to improve DEI through our people, processes, and technology.

With this in mind, we invite you to participate in the following set of voluntary demographic questions. The data collected will be used anonymously and in aggregate, so we can evaluate our processes to ensure we're providing equal opportunities to applicants from all backgrounds. Your responses, or your choice not to respond, will not be associated with your specific application and will not in any way be used for individual hiring or compensation decisions.

The following question  is optional. If you would prefer not to answer, you can skip to the next set of questions, or select "Prefer not to say". Any personal data collected using this survey, including any special categories of personal data, shall be processed in accordance with the Qualtrics Candidate Privacy Statement, available at https://www.qualtrics.com/candidate-privacy-statement/.

questions.label: How would you describe your gender identity? (mark all that apply)
Where have you seen Qualtrics prior to applying? Select all that apply.

values.label: I am a member of the Qualtrics Talent Community

I attended a networking event or career fair

I found Qualtrics through a third-party career site (Indeed, Glassdoor, University website, niche networking site, etc)
I have read content created by Qualtrics
I have used the Qualtrics product suite
I googled jobs and a Qualtrics role was suggested
I am a current Qualtrics employee

questions.label: Are you of legal age to work in the country in which this position is based?
Are you legally authorized to work in the country in which this position is located?
Do you now or will you in the future require Qualtrics to sponsor your employment in the country in which this position is located?
Are you willing to undergo a background check as part of this hiring process?
Have you ever worked at Qualtrics in the following capacities? (check all that apply):

values.label: I have not worked for Qualtrics in the past

questions.label: Are you related to a current employee of Qualtrics? If yes, please specify name and relationship. A "relative" is defined as one of the following: spouse or significant other, parent/step parent, child/step child, grandparent, grandchild, brother, sister, uncle, aunt, nephew, niece, first cousin, in-laws (mother, father, sister, brother, daughter, son).
